|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-NU168H |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half, USB) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT5370; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "NCOMPUTING N-Series REV1.0 120522" and "NComputing Inc" are silkscreened on board top.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''NComputing'' NUMO3 @600MHz :(re-labeled [https://www.electronicsdatasheets.com/download/62074.pdf STMicro SPEAr1340]) :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A9), 512KB L2 cache *GPU: ''Mali-200'' (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 2.0) *Storage: [[Samsung]] 512MB (SLC NAND) Flash *Memory: [[Samsung]] 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Ralink]] RT5370 802.11bgn (1T1R) *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Video: DVI-D port *Power: 12V/1.5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.ncomputing.com/documentation/datasheet/n-series-n500-n500w/880932 Datasheet]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> NComputing N500w Top.jpeg|Board Top NComputing N500w Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
